tools.title: Projects
tools.description: Explore the available projects and select those for further investigation and analysis.

tools.description: Build and define your custom cohorts using a variety of clinical and biospecimen features.

tools.title: Mutation Frequency
tools.description: Visualize most frequently mutated genes and somatic mutations.

tools.description: Use clinical variables to perform basic statistical analysis of your cohort.
